name: Yukinko Burning
overview: Yukinko Burning is a sound novel game for the Playstation console that is set in a snow country. The adventure takes place in the village of Charukiki and the main characters are Hayato Sanada (a young girl) and his butler (von Magnum Grey). The game story takes place in some parts of the village and the mountain and during the game the girl will meet different characters all of them with japanese voice acting. The game's plot is about that Croesus got the burning ambition of world domination and Hayato Sanada is going to try to stop him. The game features a video mode gallery that can be unlocked with the memory card. The game also have a music player.
